long_description: Offering a handy place to stash keys, phone or wallet while you ride, the Deuter City Bag Handlebar Bag features tough, water-resistant fabric to protect its contents. Deuter City Bag Handlebar Bag attaches to your handelbars with rip-and-stick straps. Coated ripstop nylon is lightweight, tough and weather-resistant. Exterior mesh pocket makes it easy to locate items; reflective highlights increase visibility in dim light.
short_description: Offering a handy place to stash keys, phone or wallet while you ride, the Deuter City Bag Handlebar Bag features tough, water-resistant fabric to protect its contents.
